text: Vihan Veljet (literal translation from Finnish: "Brothers of Hate") was a militant clandestine group within the Akateeminen Karjala-Seura (AKS). They swore a blood oath to foster and uphold hatred toward the Russian people. == See also == *Anti-Russian sentiment Category:Secret societies in Finland Category:Finnish nationalism Category:Anti-Russian sentiment
title: Vihan Veljet
